DOC.brief_summary: - Hypothermia , infection , ineffective breastfeeding commonest cause death among premature low birth weight LBW infant . Even infant born facility , incidence cold stress possible due insufficient resource , space incompetent practice manage hypothermia immediate postnatal period . Kangaroo Mother Care well-known intervention address issue related preterm birth , hypothermia , infection prolong hospitalization.Besides significant outcome KMC intervention preterm infant , interventional study find literature Pakistani context . Looking potential benefit KMC reduce related complication prematurity , study aim identify effectiveness KMC among preterm LBW infant bear secondary hospital Aga khan University hospital . Hypothesis I Ha : KMC effective reducing incidence hypothermia among preterm LBW infant compare usual care . Hypothesis II Ha : There difference breastfeed behavior breastfeeding outcome among experimental control group . Secondary Hypothesis Hypothesis I Ha : There association KMC frequency suspect infection hospitalization . Hypothesis II Ha : There difference length stay among experimental group control group . Hypothesis III Ha : There relationship KMC weight gain infant till four week . Hypothesis IV Ha : There difference rate hypothermia among experimental group control discharge hospital .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Kangaroo Mother Care Among Low Birth Weight ( LBW ) Preterm Infants
DOC.criteria: Any preterm neonate ( < 37 week gestation maternal date ) Low birth weight infant less 2500 gm . Infants brain hemorrhage , congenital abnormality . Infants need double phototherapy . Exclusion Mother : Mothers severe depression , sickness intensive care requirement . Mother refuse participate . Mothers deliver live multiple baby .
